info.name: Pink Aesthetic ROBLOX Theme [UPDATED]

Cute Pink Aesthetic theme with roses and clouds, everyones welcome to use it!

Subscribe to my youtube! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDNpP_ntFMHr6CMlXFPJVpQ

info.additionalInfo: Discontinued. I could not fix the background issue. and it had more issues after that. You can still use my other styles!
